name: Trash Toy
description:
Trash Toy is a small survival game about a tiny robot that was thrown to the trash. Now  he needs to survive inside the dump truck by blocking the pressers and jamming them. Use wasd to move, b to enter/exit buildmode, v to jam the gears (can only be used once) and e to harvest the garbage piles. while in build mode use the left/right mouse buttons to build blockers (wood is weaker than scrap!).

 This game was created for the BenBonk game jam 2#. Created by Raz, Ofer and Amit. Thanks for playing!!!
